answers.answer: Pack up if you have any reason to think you may go early. If you get something at the shower, you can always switch out. But, better than counting on the fiance to remember what you want. (I love my hubby but he would bring the most random stuff Lol)

It never hurts to be prepared!  Pack one now because you never know with preclampsia.  They did a c-section on my friend at 34 weeks and I was on strict bed rest for the last 6 weeks of my pregnancy.  My baby shower had to be rescheduled.  You can always re pack after your shower but I knew what outfit I was bringing baby home in and I brought diapers and recieving blanket.  The hospital provides most things you need.

Pack your bag whenever you feel like it. Your mother in law isn't taking you to the hospital is she? If you think there is a chance you may have to go to the hospital soon then I would pack a bag. You can always change the contents of the bag if you make past your baby shower.
It depends on whos takin me to the hospital bc my hubby works feom 345 to 1am. but i feel comfortable havin it packed but she says theres no sense in it.
If it makes you more comfortable, I'd pack it. It couldn't hurt anything. Like the other ladies said, you could always switch things out later :)

question: My fiance thinks i should pack the hospital bag because im 31 weeks and we had a scare about preeclampsia the other day. My mother in law insists that its too early because i havent had my baby shower yet.  Any thoughts on whos right?
title: hospital bag?
